lines: Ku kala munsi lya Jesu, Ndamvwa imajwi akwe,
Ku kala munsi lya Jesu, Ndilange zya kaindi,
Luyando lwakwe lubotu, Lwatola moyo wangu.
Oko ndi la sowa Zibi, Ndijane kulyo Ôkezya;
Ku kala munsi lya Jesu, Ndilile ndipaile;
Ndi kujane luse lwakwe, Ndikomanisye lyonse.
Kondipa luyando lwako, Ndibone busyu bwako;
Ko ndipa moyo wa Jesu, ÔMe ndibe mbuli nguwe,
Ndikabe kamboni wakwe, Ngu bululami bwangu.
